translations: n.蛇行；蛇形飞行；板玻璃的纵向裂纹
v.曲折行进；疏通；拖曳（snake 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: n. ［动］（印度洋，西太平洋热带海域的）海蛇

sentences.sentence: Make all customers stand in one long, snaking line—called a serpentine line—and serve each person at the front with the next available register.
sentences.translation: 让所有的顾客排成蜿蜒的长队——又称为蛇形队伍，用下一个可用的收银台为前面的每个人服务。

sentences.sentence: But snaking wires across such a huge area is expensive.
sentences.translation: 但在这样大的区域铺设电缆耗资巨大。

sentences.sentence: Despite those snaking queues, customers with branch-based accounts were stickier than many others.
sentences.translation: 即便办理业务时会排起长龙，持有支行帐户的顾客仍旧比其他人更具忠诚度。
